sentences.sContent: All these questions involve policy and tactics.
sentences.sContent_eng: All these questions involve policy and tactics.
sentences.sCn: 这些问题，都涉及政策和策略。

sentences.sContent: In the next part of this post, I'll show you a few ways you can protect yourself from some of these tactics.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the next part of this post, I'll show you a few ways you can protect yourself from some of these tactics.
sentences.sCn: 在这篇文章的下一部分中，我将向您展示几个方法可以保护自己免受这些策略。

sentences.sContent: Be Flexible But Firm Encourage your staff for a frank discussion of goals, tactics and strategies. Do not change your direction without good reason.
sentences.sContent_eng: Be Flexible But Firm Encourage your staff for a frank discussion of goals, tactics and strategies. Do not change your direction without good reason.
sentences.sCn: 灵活而坚定的鼓励你的员工对目标，战术和战略进行坦诚的讨论。没有充分的理由，不要改变你的方向。

remMethod.val: tact(接触)+ics→与不同的人接触需要讲究策略→策略

words.tran: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的

trans.tranOther: the art and science of the detailed direction and control of movement or manoeuvre of forces in battle to achieve an aim or task
